alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clinton; Fayette; Highland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 5:12PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL BROWN, SOUTHWESTERN FAYETTE, SOUTHERN CLINTON AND CENTRAL HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 512 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Lynchburg, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Greenfield, Lynchburg, Leesburg, New Vienna, Highland Holiday, Rocky Fork Point, Russell, Martinsville, Midland, Highland, St. Martin, East Monroe, Danville in Highland County, Samantha, Rainsboro, Westboro, New Martinsburg, Highland County Airport and Lees Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
